data.text:
First Day Information for New Employees

Welcome to the University of Houston-Clear Lake! We are excited you have chosen UHCL to be a part of your career in higher education. The information and links below will help to ease your transition to campus. Please be sure to contact Human Resources if you have any questions or need assistance prior to your first day.

Enrolling in UHCL Benefits

If you are benefits-eligible, you will be given information to review and complete benefits enrollment online. Benefits are administered by the Employees Retirement System of Texas (ERS). Detailed information about medical and optional benefits is available in the New Employee Benefits Guide, which can be found on our Insurance webpage.

If you do not elect your benefits within your 30 day new hire enrollment period, your coverage will default to the HealthSelect of Texas medical and basic life plans only. You will not be enrolled in any other coverages. Your next opportunity to enroll will be during summer enrollment with coverages becoming effective September 1st.

How To EnrollNew Hire Benefits ChecklistBenefits Overview

Retirement

In accordance with State of Texas law, all benefits-eligible state employees at the University of Houston-Clear Lake are required to participate in a retirement program in addition to Social Security.

Benefits-eligible employees may enroll in the Texa$aver 457 Plan or 403(b) Tax Deferred Annuity at any time during their employment. Contributions can be made before or after-tax.

If you would like to schedule an appointment, please contact your Benefits Coordinator.
